content: blanket consists of 38 coloured stripes separated by one stripe in yarn a and a striped border all around stripes of blanket are worked back and forth in row turn after each row berry sts are worked on ws of blanket even numbered row double_crochet row are worked on rs odd numbered row border is worked in rounds do not turn after each round tassels can be added to each corner if desired if you want to make sample exactly as shown follow colour numbers as listed in material list or mix as you like simply grab a new shade each time you join yarn b blanket as given uses half a scheepjes scrumptious colour pack other half of the colour pack can be used to create yarn the after party 203 scrumptious squares blanket **list of materials** **scheepjes scrumptious** 50% recycled polyester recycled plastic bottles 50% acrylic 100g/300m -yarn a 302 buttercream icing x 4 balls **scheepjes scrumptious colour pack** 50% recycled polyester recycled plastic bottles 50% acrylic 80 x 30g/97m -yarn b 371 322 366 337 363 335 360 341 379 309 328 380 323 316 354 343 362 321 351 348 350 333 312 373 356 359 375 370 327 340 368 334 355 358 345 336 374 365 303 317 x 1 ball -4mm crochet hook *use remaining 40 colours of the colour pack to make yarn the after party 203 scrumptious squares blanket *
